verses.kjv: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;
verses.web: That which was from the beginning, that which we have heard, that which we have seen with our eyes, that which we saw, and our hands touched, concerning the Word of life
verses.ct: We are writing to you about the Word of life — the one who existed from the very beginning. We heard him with our own ears, saw him with our own eyes, and touched him with our own hands.

verses.kjv: (For the life was manifested, and we have seen it, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)
verses.web: (and the life was revealed, and we have seen, and testify, and declare to you the life, the eternal life, which was with the Father, and was revealed to us);
verses.ct: This life was revealed to us, and we saw it firsthand. So we testify and declare to you this eternal life that was with the Father and was made known to us.

verses.kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
verses.web: that which we have seen and heard we declare to you, that you also may have fellowship with us. Yes, and our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son, Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: What we saw and heard, we're now sharing with you so that you can have fellowship with us. And our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son, Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.
verses.web: And we write these things to you, that our joy may be fulfilled.
verses.ct: We're writing these things to you so that your joy may be complete.

verses.kjv: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
verses.web: This is the message which we have heard from him and announce to you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
verses.ct: Here is the message we heard from him and are passing on to you: God is light, and there is no darkness in him at all.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
verses.web: If we say that we have fellowship with him and walk in the darkness, we lie, and don’t tell the truth.
verses.ct: If we claim to have fellowship with him but keep living in darkness, we're lying and not living by the truth.

verses.kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
verses.web: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ, his Son, cleanses us from all sin.
verses.ct: But if we live in the light, just as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ, his Son, cleanses us from every sin.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
verses.web: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
verses.ct: If we claim we have no sin, we're only fooling ourselves, and the truth isn't in us.

verses.kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.web: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive us the sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.ct: But if we confess our sins, he is faithful and just — he will forgive our sins and cleanse us from everything we've done wrong.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
verses.web: If we say that we haven’t sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
verses.ct: If we claim we haven't sinned, we're calling God a liar, and his word has no place in us.
